name: Explosion Farm
description:
The project was made as part of the training and courses of a technical artist. As soon as I have free time, I want to finish a full-fledged game. Implemented in this version:

Buy/Sell Resource

  • ShopKeeper
  • Inventory

Use Item

  • Add Item to Quick Slot
  • Using item in QuickSlot
  • Count Money

Interaction

  • PickUp Item
  • Planting in gradle
  • Harvesting Plants
  • Grows plants
  • Buildings

I would like to know the opinion about the conceived idea. Is it worth it to keep developing?
